name: Beyond The Void (itch)
description:
WASD to move, Shift to sprint, W to climb short walls

Space to jump, Space to wall-climb/wall-jump

LMB to grapple, RMB to dash. Grapple and dash levers to activate them.

It is a game about exploring an area filled with ancient technology. Progress through the game to get powerups and items to explore more. Made in a total of 5 days in a team of 2 (Hyperbrid and JudgementCole) for the Game Developers Guild 7-day Jam
